UtilGenericData.Name: VS 2017
UtilGenericData.Value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\Common7\IDE\devenv.exe

UtilGenericData.Name: VS 2019
UtilGenericData.Value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Enterprise\Common7\IDE\devenv.exe

UtilGenericData.Name: VS 2022
UtilGenericData.Value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\Common7\IDE\devenv.exe

UtilGenericData.Name: SQL server
UtilGenericData.Value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio 18\Common7\IDE\Ssms.exe

UtilGenericData.Name: SDIS
UtilGenericData.Value: DCFBIWAD1

UtilGenericData.Name: New Install
UtilGenericData.Value: DCFBIWAD7

UtilGenericData.Name: Prunm
UtilGenericData.Value: ESNESTADO

UtilGenericData.Name: NDIS
UtilGenericData.Value: DCFBINDIS

UtilGenericData.Name: Update CODIS Version
Update CODIS version In Registry
UtilGenericData.Value: Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CODIS] "Version"="???.0.0.0" "CurrentVersion"="???.0.0.0"

UtilGenericData.Name: TFS
UtilGenericData.Value:
Set-Alias buildCode "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe" Set-Alias tf "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\Common7\IDE\CommonExtensions\Microsoft\TeamFoundation\Team Explorer\tf.exe"
#//get the latest tf get C:\Proj\R\CODIS\Trunk\Source\Product /recursive
#// Build the latest buildCode OptSolNamePath??? /t:OptBuild??? /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64

UtilGenericData.Name: Give me Admin access to this CODIS database
Disable IS services
UtilGenericData.Value: update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 0 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Deletion' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 0 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Enrollment' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 0 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Modification' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 0 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Query' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 0 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Search' UPDATE CODIS_AppConfigSettings SET AttributeValue = 0 WHERE AttributeName = 'Match_Query';

UtilGenericData.Name: Match Database version with local machine Registry
UtilGenericData.Value: update DB_Version set gdis_version = '???.0.0.0' where Date_This_Action = (select max(Date_This_Action) from DB_Version) update CODIS_Version set Build = '???.0.0.0' where Version_CD = (select max(Version_CD) from CODIS_Version)

UtilGenericData.Name: 1- Verify Current Domain Level in your local box
UtilGenericData.Value: SELECT CODIS_Domain.Domain_Level, Lab.Lab_ID, CODIS_Version.Version, CODIS_Version.Build FROM CODIS_Domain INNER JOIN Lab ON CODIS_Domain.State_CD = Lab.State_CD AND CODIS_Domain.Lab_CD = Lab.Lab_CD CROSS JOIN (select top 1 * from CODIS_Version order by Version_CD desc) CODIS_Version

UtilGenericData.Name: 2- Enable IS services
UtilGenericData.Value: update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Deletion' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Enrollment' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Modification' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Query' update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'Specimen_Search' UPDATE CODIS_AppConfigSettings SET AttributeValue = 1 WHERE AttributeName = 'Match_Query';

UtilGenericData.Name: 3- Set Message Auto Execution Service timer to 1 minute (by default)
UtilGenericData.Value: Update CODIS_AppConfigSettings set AttributeValue = 1 where AttributeName = 'AutoExecuteTimer' and ApplicationName = 'MessageService'

UtilGenericData.Name: Upload 1331
UtilGenericData.Value:
SET IDENTITY_INSERT CODIS_Message ON INSERT INTO CODIS_Message([Msg_CD] ,[Msg_Subject] ,[Msg_Text2] ,[Msg_Attachment_Name] ,[Msg_Type] ,[Msg_Destination] ,[Msg_Source] ,[Msg_Select_Dt] ,[Msg_Select_By] ,[Msg_Create_Dt] ,[Msg_Receive_Dt] ,[Msg_Status] ,[Archive_CD] ,[Msg_Text] ,[Msg_Sent_Dt] ,[Msg_Status_Text] ,[Msg_Enable])
SELECT Max(Cm.Msg_CD+1) ,'UPL:Full upload 4 from DCFBIWAD7' --Message Subject , Max(Msg_CD+1) ,'1331.UPZ' --UPload package name ,'UPL' --Message type = Upload ,'ExistingAnalyst@DCFBIWAD1' --To user at SDIS ,'ATTestRunner@DCFBIWAD1' --From user at LDIS ,'2019-01-04 16:22:36.000' --Select Date ,'ATTestRunner' --Select By ,'2019-01-04 16:22:36.000' --Create Date ,'1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' --Receive Date, null date because it was never sent? ,'1' --Message Status, not sure what "0" means. ,NULL --Archive_CD ,'Full upload 4 fom DCFBIWAD7' --Message Text ,'2019-01-04 16:22:36.000' --Message Sent Date ,'' --Message Status Text ,'1' --Message Enable FROM CODIS_Message Cm SET IDENTITY_INSERT CODIS_Message OFF

UtilGenericData.Name: Get distinct Rank AT
UtilGenericData.Value: SELECT distinct Audit_Action.Action, Audit_Operation.Operation, Audit_Module.Module, Audit_Trail.Rank_ID, Audit_Trail.Spec_Lab_ID, Audit_Trail.Spec_ID, Audit_Trail.Audit_Dt, Audit_Trail.Audit_Details, Audit_Trail.Pedigree_Node_ID, Audit_Trail.Pedigree_Lab_ID, Audit_Trail.Pedigree_ID, Audit_Trail.User_Lab_ID, Audit_Trail.Search_Program, Audit_Trail.Search_Level, Audit_Trail.Audit_User_ID FROM Audit_Trail_Rank_Result AS Audit_Trail INNER JOIN Audit_Operation ON Audit_Trail.Operation_CD = Audit_Operation.Operation_CD INNER JOIN Audit_Module ON Audit_Trail.Module_CD = Audit_Module.Module_CD INNER JOIN Audit_Action ON Audit_Trail.Action_CD = Audit_Action.Action_CD AND Audit_Operation.Operation_CD = Audit_Action.Operation_CD

UtilGenericData.Name: Change to Analyst role
Swap User Role
UtilGenericData.Value: Update codis.dbo.[GDIS_User] set user_id = 'tin.nguyenX' where user_id in ('tin.nguyen') Update codis.dbo.[GDIS_User] set user_id = 'tin.nguyen' where user_id in ('CAdminDevSupA') Update codis.dbo.[GDIS_User] set user_id = 'CAdminDevSupA' where user_id in ('tin.nguyenX') select * from codis.dbo.[GDIS_User] where user_id in ('tin.nguyen','CAdminDevSupA')
